passive.name: PHENOMENAL EVIL POWER
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) PHENOMENAL EVIL POWER
                                Hitting an Enemy Champion with a spell grants Veigar 1 stack of Phenomenal Evil.Killing minions or monsters with a spell grants Veigar 1 stack of Phenomenal Evil.Champion takedowns grant Veigar 7 stacks of Phenomenal Evil.Each stack of Phenomenal Evil grants 1 Ability Power.

w.name: (W) DARK MATTER
w.description:
(W) DARK MATTER
 8s   65/70/75/80 
                                
                                
                                Veigar summons dark matter from the sky, dealing 100 magic damage (100/160/220/280 + 95% ).Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce this ability's cooldown by 10%.

e.name: (E) EVENT HORIZON
e.description:
(E) EVENT HORIZON
 18/17/16/15s   75/80/85/90 
                                
                                
                                Veigar creates a cage that stuns enemies that pass through for 1.75/2/2.25/2.5 seconds. The cage lasts for 3 seconds.Veigar's auto casts will prioritize targets stunned by Event Horizon.

r.name: (R) PRIMORDIAL BURST
r.description:
(R) PRIMORDIAL BURST
 60/55/50s   100 
                                
                                
                                Veigar blasts an Enemy Champion with primal magic to deal 185 magic damage (185/250/315 + 75% ) to them, increased by 0% - 100% based on the target's missing health.Deals max damage to enemies below 35% health.
